name: Queen's Garden
description: In a barren kingdom set atop a hill There lived a king and queen, who likely live there still The king was a caring man who loved to please his queen His plan was to grow a garden bigger than there had ever been You will cultivate a sea of bloom; fill the air with the breath of roses From barren land to blossom - a sweet bouquet to royal noses A perennial job for a seasoned grower - a garden for royalty Apply within to serve the queen and be ever rewarded for your loyalty! - 100 Challenging match-3 levels - 60 garden decorations to choose from - Several hidden object scenes and memory games as bonus - Play relaxed, timed and move restricted mode!
